name: JointConnector
shortDescription: Create and manage physics joints between two objects.
description: Weld joint:  Glue two objects together.
Rope joint: Two objects can get closer to each other but they cannot exceed their starting distance.
Distance joint:  Two objects are forced to stay at set distance from each other.  Adjust the frequency property to change the stiffness of the spring.
Revolute joint:  Two objects are connected but can rotate on the joint.  Angles can be restricted and joints can have motors that spin the objects.

eventsFunctions.description: Connect overlapping physics objects with a revolute joint.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Connect overlapping objects with a revolute joint
eventsFunctions.name: CreateRevoluteJoints
eventsFunctions.sentence: Connect overlapping _PARAM1_ with a revolute joint located at the center of _PARAM3_

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Create and manage revolute joints between two objects.
Also known as a hinge joint because the objects act like they are connected with a hinge that pivots.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: RevoluteJoint

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) breaking of joint.
eventsFunctions.name: SetEnableBreaking

eventsFunctions.description: Set breaking force of joint.
eventsFunctions.name: SetBreakingForce

eventsFunctions.description: Break revolute joint if it exceeds breaking force.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Break revolute joint if it exceeds breaking force
eventsFunctions.name: BreakJointIfNeeded
eventsFunctions.sentence: Break revolute joint on _PARAM2_ (that was created by _PARAM0_) if it exceeds breaking force

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) motor of joint.
eventsFunctions.name: SetEnableMotor

eventsFunctions.description: Set motor strength (torque) of joint.
eventsFunctions.name: SetMotorStrength

eventsFunctions.description: Set motor rotation speed of joint.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set motor rotation speed of joint
eventsFunctions.name: SetMotorSpeed
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set motor rotation speed of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) angle limits on joint.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Enable (or disable) angle limits on joint
eventsFunctions.name: SetEnableAngleLimits

eventsFunctions.description: Set clockwise angle limit of joint.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set clockwise angle limit of joint
eventsFunctions.name: SetClockwiseAngleLimit
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set clockwise angle limit of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Set counter-clockwise angle limit of joint.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set counter-clockwise angle limit of joint
eventsFunctions.name: SetCounterClockwiseAngleLimit
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set counter-clockwise angle limit of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

propertyDescriptors.label: Enable (or disable) angle limits on joint
propertyDescriptors.name: AngleLimitsEnabled

propertyDescriptors.label: Angle movement allowed in clockwise direction (degrees)
propertyDescriptors.name: ClockwiseAngleLimit

propertyDescriptors.label: Angle movement allowed in counter-clockwise direction (degrees)
propertyDescriptors.name: CounterClockwiseAngleLimit

propertyDescriptors.label: Force required to break joint apart
propertyDescriptors.name: BreakingForce

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Create and manage weld joints between two objects.
Also known as a static joint because the objects stay glued in the same relative position to each other.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: WeldJoint

eventsFunctions.description: Break revolute joint if it exceeds breaking force.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Break revolute joint if it exceeds breaking force
eventsFunctions.name: BreakJointIfNeeded
eventsFunctions.sentence: Break revolute joint on _PARAM2_ (that was created by _PARAM0_) if it exceeds breaking force

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) breaking of joint.
eventsFunctions.name: SetEnableBreaking

eventsFunctions.description: Set breaking force of joint.
eventsFunctions.name: SetBreakingForce

eventsFunctions.description: Set frequency of joint.  Range: 0 to 60 (or the maximum FPS of game).
eventsFunctions.name: SetFrequency

propertyDescriptors.label: Frequency
propertyDescriptors.description: Set a number between 0 and 60. Higher numbers represent a stronger bond.
propertyDescriptors.name: Frequency

propertyDescriptors.label: Breaking force
propertyDescriptors.description: Force required to break joint apart (joint breaking must be enabled)
propertyDescriptors.name: BreakingForce

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Create and manage distance joints between two objects. 
Acts like a spring because the objects try to stay the same distance apart.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: DistanceJoint

eventsFunctions.description: Break revolute joint if it exceeds breaking force.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Break revolute joint if it exceeds breaking force
eventsFunctions.name: BreakJointIfNeeded
eventsFunctions.sentence: Break revolute joint on _PARAM2_ (that was created by _PARAM0_) if it exceeds breaking force

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) breaking of joint.
eventsFunctions.name: SetEnableBreaking

eventsFunctions.description: Set breaking force of joint.
eventsFunctions.name: SetBreakingForce

eventsFunctions.description: Set frequency of joint.  Range: 0 to 60 (or the maximum FPS of game).
eventsFunctions.name: SetFrequency

eventsFunctions.description: Set dampting ratio of joint.  Range: 0 to 1.
eventsFunctions.name: SetDampingRatio

propertyDescriptors.label: Distance between objects (pixels)
propertyDescriptors.description: Set this to 0 to keep the objects at their current distance.
propertyDescriptors.name: Distance

propertyDescriptors.label: Frequency
propertyDescriptors.description: Set a number between 0 and 60. Higher numbers represent a stiffer spring.
propertyDescriptors.name: Frequency

propertyDescriptors.label: Force required to break joint apart
propertyDescriptors.name: BreakingForce

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Create and manage rope joints between two objects. 
Objects can get closer, but they cannot exceed the starting distance from each other.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: RopeJoint

eventsFunctions.description: Break revolute joint if it exceeds breaking force.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Break revolute joint if it exceeds breaking force
eventsFunctions.name: BreakJointIfNeeded
eventsFunctions.sentence: Break revolute joint on _PARAM2_ (that was created by _PARAM0_) if it exceeds breaking force

eventsFunctions.description: Enable (or disable) breaking of joint.
eventsFunctions.name: SetEnableBreaking

eventsFunctions.description: Set breaking force of joint.
eventsFunctions.name: SetBreakingForce

propertyDescriptors.label: Max distance between objects (pixels)
propertyDescriptors.description: Objects can come nearer, but they will not exceed this value.
propertyDescriptors.name: MaxDistance

propertyDescriptors.label: Frequency
propertyDescriptors.description: Set a number between 0 and 60. Higher numbers represent a stiffer spring.
propertyDescriptors.name: Frequency

propertyDescriptors.label: Force required to break joint apart
propertyDescriptors.name: BreakingForce
